t:test_case.t:objective: account setup
t:test_case.t:steps: 1.Admin login 2.Create test account 3.Use lmtp inject to inject the message

t:test_case.t:objective: Create setup for the Search
t:test_case.t:steps: 1. Login to the account. 2. Search a mail to get the message-id. 3. Create tag 4. Tag the mails.

t:test_case.t:objective: Verify that a search for tagged mail after:-1hour returns correct mails
Verify that a search for tagged mail after:-4hour returns the correct email
Verify that a search for tagged mail with query "(after:-1day)" is successful
Verify that a search for yesterday's tagged mail with query as "((after:-2day AND before:-1day) )" is successful
Verify that a search for this week's tagged mail with query as "(after:-1week)" is successful
Verify that a search for last week tagged mails with query as "((after:-2week AND before:-1week))" is successful
Verify that a search for this month's tagged mails with query as "(after:-1month)" is successful
Verify that a search for last month's tagged mails with query as "((after:-2month AND before:-1month) )" is successful
Verify that a search for this year with query as "(after:-1year)" is successful
Verify that a search for last year with query as "((after:-2year AND before:-1year))" is successful
Verify that a search for tagged mail with query "after:-1hour OR after:-4hour" is successful
Verify that a search for tagged mail with query "after:-1day OR after:-4hour" is successful
Verify that a search for tagged mail with query "after:-1day OR after:-1hour" is successful
Verify that a search for tagged mail with query "after:-1day OR after:-1hour OR after:-4hour" is successful
Verify that a search for mails with query as "((after:-2day AND before:-1day) OR after:-1day)" is successful
Verify that a search for mails with query as "((after:-2day AND before:-1day) OR after:-4hour)" is successful
Verify that a search for mails with query as "((after:-2day AND before:-1day) OR after:-1hour)" is successful
Verify that a search with query as "((after:-2day AND before:-1day) OR after:-1hour OR after:-4hour OR after:-1day)" is successful
Verify that a search for mails with query as "(after:-1week OR (after:-2day AND before:-1day))" is successful
Verify that a search for last week mails with query as "(after:-1week OR (after:-2week AND before:-1week))" is successful
Verify that a search for tagged mail after:-1hour returns correct mails (for conversation)
Verify that a search for tagged mail after:-4hour returns the correct email (for conversation)
Verify that a search for tagged mail with query "after:-1hour OR after:-4hour" is successful(for conversation)
Verify that a search for tagged mail with query "(after:-1day)" is successful (for conversation)
Verify that a search for tagged mail with query "after:-1day OR after:-4hour" is successful (for conversation)
Verify that a search for tagged mail with query "after:-1day OR after:-1hour" is successful (for conversation)
Verify that a search for tagged mail with query "after:-1day OR after:-1hour OR after:-4hour" is successful (for conversation)
Verify that a search for yesterday's mail with query as "((after:-2day AND before:-1day))" is successful (for conversation)
Verify that a search for mails with query as "((after:-2day AND before:-1day) OR after:-1day)" is successful (for conversation)
Verify that a search for mails with query as "((after:-2day AND before:-1day) OR after:-4hour)" is successful (for conversation)
Verify that a search for mails with query as "((after:-2day AND before:-1day) OR after:-1hour)" is successful (for conversation)
Verify that a search with query as "((after:-2day AND before:-1day) OR after:-1hour OR after:-4hour OR after:-1day)" is successful (for conversation)
Verify that a search for this week's mail with query as "(after:-1week)" is successful (for conversation)
Verify that a search for mails with query as "(after:-1week OR (after:-2day AND before:-1day))" is successful (for conversation)
Verify that a search for last week mails with query as "((after:-2week AND before:-1week))" is successful (for conversation)
Verify that a search with query as "(after:-1week OR (after:-2week AND before:-1week))" is successful (for conversation)
Verify that a search for this month mails with query as "(after:-1month)" is successful (for conversation)
Verify that a search for last months mail with query as "((after:-2month AND before:-1month))" is successful (for conversation)
Verify that a search mail with query as "NOT((after:-2week AND before:-1week))" is successful (for conversation)
Verify that a search for this year with query as "(after:-1year)" is successful (for conversation)
Verify that a search for last year with query as "((after:-2year AND before:-1year))" is successful (for conversation)
Verify that a search for tagged mail with query NOT(after:-1hour)
Verify that a search for tagged mail with query NOT(after:-4hour)
Verify that a search with query as "NOT(after:-1week)" is successful
Verify that a search with query as "NOT((after:-1year)" is successful (for conversation)
Verify that a search for tagged mail with query NOT(after:-1hour) (for conversation)
Verify that a search for tagged mail with query NOT(after:-4hour) (for conversation)
